FuncDef: This command configures a 10 Gb/s interface to be in Local or Wide Area Network (LAN or WAN) mode. When configuring the port to be in WAN mode certain SONET/SDH parameters can be changed to reflect the SONET/SDH requirements for this port.

ParaDef.Info: Sets the port to operate in LAN mode.
Sets the port to operate in WAN mode.
